definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: I have also written a good essay, essay competitions among the best.
sentences.chinese: 我作文也寫的很好，徵文比賽名列前茅。

sentences.english: Run out of breakfast, I logged an innovative composition network, began to publish the article.
sentences.chinese: 用完早餐，我又登錄了創新作文網，開始發表文章。

sentences.english: Compare your composition with the sample, you will learn a lot.
sentences.chinese: 把你的作文同範文比較一下，你會學到很多東西。

sentences.english: Students′oversight in the course of topic exploring will lead to the failure of their compositions.
sentences.chinese: 審題時的疏漏會導致作文失敗，寫作成績不理想。

sentences.english: Be sure to hand in your compositions this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 務必在今天下午把作文交來。

sentences.english: After leafing through the student's composition,the teacher pointed out some slight mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 在草草讀完學生的作文以後，老師指出了一些小錯誤。

sentences.english: Write a composition of more or less 200 words on the topic"computers".
sentences.chinese: 寫一篇200字左右的作文，標題爲“計算機”。

sentences.english: I took two hours to finish the composition.
sentences.chinese: 我花了兩個小時才完成這篇作文。

sentences.english: I have a question about English. Help me!
sentences.chinese: 誰給我提供幾篇高考英語作文範文？

sentences.english: Oral composition and 3-minute training method: This method is suitable for intense training.
sentences.chinese: 口語作文和3分鐘訓練法:此法適用於強化訓練。

sentences.english: The teacher made comments on our compositions.
sentences.chinese: 老師就我們的作文作了講評。

sentences.english: I'm certain that he will accept the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他接受這英語作文範文網收集。

sentences.english: He wrote a great article yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天寫了一篇好作文。

sentences.english: Start from high school to attend the new concept composition journey.
sentences.chinese: 從高中開始到參加新概念作文的路程。

sentences.english: The demand is that the composition (should) be written on one side only.
sentences.chinese: 按照要求作文必須單面謄寫。

sentences.english: The prerequisite for Chinese Lit is Freshman Lit and Comp.
sentences.chinese: 若要從事中國文學，必須在一年級修文學與作文。

definition: literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
applied writing/writing for practical purposes (business letters, advertising etc)
